languages.text:
While in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the Operative gains +25% cover efficiency, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.
languages.original_text:
Находясь в укрытии, оперативник получает +25% к {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности укрытия{/g}, +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}.
Действует, пока оперативник не начнет движение. {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Эффект{/g} не суммируется.

traits.locale_text:
While in cover, the Adept gains +25% cover efficiency, +15 Perception, and +15 Ballistic Skill.
This effect lasts until the Adept moves. Does not stack.

This effect lasts until the Adept moves. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Находясь в укрытии, адепт получает +25% к эффективности укрытия, +15 к Восприятию и +15 к Дальнему Бою.
Действует, пока адепт не начнет движение. Эффект не суммируется.

Находясь в укрытии, адепт получает +25% к эффективности укрытия, +15 к Восприятию и +15 к Дальнему Бою.
Действует, пока адепт не начнет движение. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text:
当身处{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}中时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}获得+25%掩体效果，+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。
此效果持续至特工移动为止。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text:
While in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} gains +25% cover efficiency, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
This effect lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
当身处{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}中时，技师会获得+25%{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}掩体{/g}效果，+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，+15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}。
此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}持续至技师移动为止。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text:
Mientras esté en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}, el agente gana +25 % de eficacia de cobertura, +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.
Este efecto dura hasta que el agente se mueva. Este {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text:
While in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the Operative gains +25% cover efficiency, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Mientras esté en {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}, el agente gana +25 % de eficacia de cobertura, +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の後ろにいる間、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の遮蔽率が+25%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}が+15、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+15増加する。
この効果はオペレーターが移動するまで継続する。スタックしない。
languages.original_text:
While in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, the Operative gains +25% cover efficiency, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.
This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の後ろにいる間、アデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}遮蔽率{/g}が+25%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}が+15、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技能{/g}が+15増加する。
この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}はアデプトが移動するまで継続する。スタックしない。

languages.text:
In {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} hat der Agent +25 % Deckungseffizienz, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}.
Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g} dauert an, bis sich der Agent bewegt. Nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text:

This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
In {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} erlangt der Agent +25 % Deckungseffizienz, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}.
Dieser Effekt hat Bestand, bis sich der Agent bewegt. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text: Lorsqu'il est à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvert{/g}, l'agent bénéficie de +25 % d'efficacité de couverture, de +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et de +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} dure jusqu'à ce que l'agent se déplace. Non cumulable.

This {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsqu'il est {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}, l'Adepte bénéficie de +25 % d'efficacité de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCover}couverture{/g}, de +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et de +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g}.
Cet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} dure jusqu'à ce que l'Adepte se déplace. Non cumulable.

languages.text:
Ajan, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperdeyken{/g} +%25 siper etkililiği, +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ve +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} kazanır.
Bu {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}etki{/g}, Ajan hareket edene dek sürer. Etki üst üste birikmez.
